title: Five-Star Belgian Chateau Getaway
description: Nestled at the edge of Genval Lake you’ll find an indulgent chateau escape in one of Belgium most picturesque regions. Drive 30 minutes from Brussels Airport and reach a 1900’s castle-hotel that blends elegantly into its tranquil surrounds. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome glass of sparkling wine on arrival, welcome chocolates and a guaranteed late 2pm checkout.
